meanings.definition: Higher in rank, status, or quality than others.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's superior knowledge helped the students understand the difficult concept.
meanings.sent2: The queen's superior beauty captivated everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's superior strength made the villain's plan seem futile.
meanings.sent4: Her superior intelligence shone brightly among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The superior craftsmanship of the handmade furniture was evident in every detail.

meanings.definition: A person of higher rank or status.
meanings.sent1: The military general was a superior who commanded respect from all soldiers.
meanings.sent2: She always sought advice from her superiors before making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The superior at the office party surprised everyone by showing off his dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The young recruit looked up to his superior as a mentor and role model.
meanings.sent5: The company's superiors congratulated the team on their successful project completion.

meanings.definition: Showing a high level of skill or excellence.
meanings.sent1: The artist's superior brush strokes created a masterpiece on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: His superior performance in the competition earned him a gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The chef's superior cooking skills turned a simple dish into a gourmet delight.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's superior speed allowed him to outpace his competitors effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The superior craftsmanship of the watch was evident in its intricate design.

meanings.definition: Located above or on top of something.
meanings.sent1: The superior floor of the building offered a breathtaking view of the city.
meanings.sent2: The superior shelf in the closet held all the rarely used items.
meanings.sent3: The superior bunk in the cabin became the most sought-after spot among the campers.
meanings.sent4: The superior branch of the tree provided a perfect perch for the bird to sing.
meanings.sent5: The superior position of the lighthouse ensured visibility for miles around.
